name: Patent Bustier
description: The Chromat Patent Bustier, with patent leather cups and ribcage style strapping, is the perfect addition to your armored bustier collection. Available in all-black. From the Riot Box Collection, the Chromat Patent Bustier was designed to accentuate the contours of the female body with simple architectural lines and an external skeletal structure. The solid patent leather cups feel like molded armor, granting the wearer fierce protection. Small: 32B, 25" waist Medium: 34C, 27" waist Large: 36D, 30" waist For custom size, please email us at orders@chromatgarments.com or include the custom measurement notes in your order. Model wears a size small.

name: Underwire Bra
description: The Chromat Underwire Bralette is one of our all-time best sellers and now it is available with a soft-lined bra cup! Body made of corset boning and elastic with back zip. Bra cups made of satin lycra and soft molded cup with encased underwire. Small: body at underbust is 25" cup size 32a Medium: body at underbust is 27" cup size 34b Large: body at underbust is 30" cup size 36b Model is wearing a size small. For custom size (bra cup up to 36c), please email us at orders@chromatgarments.com or include the custom measurement notes in your order. Comes in black. *All cage pieces are made-to-order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for production and delivery.

name: Kimono Harness
description: The Chromat Kimono Harness is made of corset boning and elastic with two side zippers. Worn by Madonna on her MDNA 2012 World Tour! Part of the Chromat Core Cage collection, the Kimono Harness was designed to accentuate the contours of the female body with simple architectural interventions. Comes in black, white. Small fits waist 25", medium waist 27", large waist 30". For custom size, please email us at orders@chromatgarments.com or include the custom measurement notes in your order. *All cage pieces are made-to-order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for production and delivery.

name: Machine City Dress
description: The Chromat Machine City Dress is a showpiece from the SUPERSTRUCTURES collection with a gridded structure that envelops the body with underwire details and structured skirt. The Machine City Dress is made of boning and elastic with a metal zipper at center back. This piece is part of the Chromat Autumn/Winter 2013 SUPERSTRUCTURES collection. The collection was inspired by three-dimensional translations of mathematical equations and the work of sixties futurist architects: Superstudio’s monolithic grid structures and Archigram’s dystopian visions for future cities. The Machine City Dress is designed to accentuate the contours of the body with architectural lines and a scaffolding-like structure. The Machine City Dress appears in the "Color Shift" 2014 Lexus IS Commercial. Available in White or Black. Small: 25" waist Medium: 27" waist Large: 30" waist Model wears a size small. Custom sizing is available, please email orders@chromatgarments.com. All cage pieces are made to order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for production and shipping. For 1 week priority production, please include a RUSH fee to your order.

The collection was inspired by three-dimensional translations of mathematical equations and the work of sixties futurist architects: Superstudio’s monolithic grid structures and Archigram’s dystopian visions for future cities. name: Jessica Rabbit Cage Dress
description: The Jessica Rabbit Cage is made of corset boning and elastic with back zip on skirt and adjustable elastic strap at back bust. Metal closure at back. A showpiece of the Chromat A/W 12 Cool World collection, the Jessica Rabbit Cage dress was inspired by exaggerated constructions of femininity in cartoons and distorted disney characters. Comes in black, red. Adjustable back strap. Small fits waist 25", medium waist 27", large waist 30". name: Pentagram Suit II
description: The Chromat Pentagram Suit (back by Popular Demand!) II is an incredible monokini with pentagram crossed straps at bust, waist and back. Bandeau top and bottom briefs are fully lined. Black heavy duty plastic and metal hardware closures at waist, bra and halter straps at neck. Imported nylon/lycra spandex. Part of the SS13 Riot Box collection, the Pentagram Suit II is designed to accentuate the contours of the female body with architectural lines and a scaffolding-like structure. Small: 30 bust, 28 underbust, 23 waist, 29 hip. Front strap extends 8 inches from bottom of bandeau to top of briefs. Medium: 32 bust, 29 underbust, 25 waist, 31 hip. Front strap extends 8.5 inches from bottom of bandeau to top of briefs. Large: 34 bust, 30 underbust, 28 waist, 32 hip. Front strap extends 9 inches from bottom of bandeau to top of briefs. Model wears a size small.

Part of the Chromat S/S 12 Dark Cross collection, the Papal Cross headband was inspired by ornate Roman Catholic cathedrals, devout hooded women and pagan rituals. Comes in black, white. Small fits 32a with waist 25", medium 34b with waist 27", large 36c with waist 30". For custom size, please email us at orders@chromatgarments.com or include the custom measurement notes in your order. *All cage pieces are made-to-order. Please allow 2-3 weeks for production and delivery.

name: Rush Fee
description:
Each Chromat cage (not including the swimwear) is made to order.  With our current production schedule, the minimum time it takes to produce individual orders is 2 weeks. 

However, we do offer a 1 week turnaround option for a rush fee of $50. That means you will have your Chromat piece in the mail within one week of the time of order. US orders are shipped using USPS Priority Mail 2 day shipping service, International orders are shipped using USPS Express Mail which is 3-5 days depending on the country.

We want you to love what you ordered and have it in time for your awesome party! If there is a deadline or event you are hoping to wear the piece for, please let us know in the comment section and we can work out the timing with you. 

Thanks!
